select cols.column_name, (case when cols.is_nullable = 'NO' and cols.column_default is null then '1' else null end) as is_required, (case when cols.column_name in ( select ccu.column_name from information_schema.constraint_column_usage as ccu where ccu.table_schema = cols.table_schema and ccu.table_name = cols.table_name) then '1' else '0' end) as is_pk, cols.ordinal_position as sort, ( select pgd.description from pg_description pgd where pgd.objoid = ( select c.oid from pg_class c where c.relname = cols.table_name and c.relnamespace = ( select n.oid from pg_namespace n where n.nspname = cols.table_schema ) ) and pgd.objsubid = cols.ordinal_position) as column_comment, (case when cols.column_default like 'nextval(%' then '1' else '0' end) as is_increment, ( case when cols.data_type = 'character varying' then 'varchar' when cols.data_type = 'character' then 'char' when cols.data_type like 'timestamp%' then 'datetime' else cols.data_type end ) || coalesce('(' || cols.character_maximum_length || ')', '') as column_type from information_schema.columns as cols where cols.table_schema = current_schema() and cols.table_name = #{tableName} order by cols.ordinal_position
